results.title: Not ready
results.creator_credit: Linh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: While Linh Nguyen is on the cusp of adulthood and taking the next step in her life, she reflects on a simpler, more carefree time and hopes for a time where she will gain greater clarity and certainty.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Linh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: While Linh Nguyen is on the cusp of adulthood and taking the next step in her life, she reflects on a simpler, more carefree time and hopes for a time where she will gain greater clarity and certainty.

results.title: Sweet long ride
results.creator_credit: Linda Ellen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Laurie and Linda Ellen have taken holidays four times a year for the past thirty-four years. She reflects on the changes in their holidaying as well as some of the more enduring memories of their time away from home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Linda Ellen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Recollection
results.creator_credit: Jessica Steinmann, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jessica Steinmann reflects on a time she can remember very little of, when an accident caused her to be unconscious for around twenty minutes.

results.title: Our time
results.creator_credit: Evangelos Thiveos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: For Evangelos Thiveos, time with the family is centred around dinner time, where everyone gets to talk about their day, while ‘stuffing their faces’ with the copious amounts of food prepared earlier.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Evangelos Thiveos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: True friend
results.creator_credit: Elizabeth Phan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Moving to a new city and making new friends is never easy, and Elizabeth Phan found it particularly difficult. Gradually, though, Phan was able to learn the meaning of the words ‘true friend’.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Elizabeth Phan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Building
results.creator_credit: Dale Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dale Smith dedicates her story to her dad, a man of infinite creativity and resourcefulness. His inventiveness extended to building houses, caravans, mobile homes, trailers and, above all, a family who adore him.

results.title: Welcome to my nightmare
results.creator_credit: Zoero Theoharou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zoero Theoharou delves back into a time when she felt lost, trapped in a cold nightmare of misery from which she couldn’t wake. The only release from this nightmare was through pain.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zoero Theoharou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My life with my family
results.creator_credit: Negabanchi Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Life, so far, has been quite a struggle for Negabanchi Tebeje and her family. With her dad fighting for democracy, the Tebeje family have moved from Ethiopia to Sudan and, finally, Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Negabanchi Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
